app.Advance App TestTip:
The current application is advanced editing mode 
. If you need to switch to [simple mode], please click the save button on the left
app.Chat Logs Tips: Logs record the app's online, shared, and API(chatId is existing) conversations
app.Confirm Del App Tip: Confirm to delete the app and all its chats
app.Export Config Successful: The configuration has been copied. Please check for important data
app.Import Configs Failed: Failed to import the configuration, please ensure that the configuration is normal!

module.Custom Title Tip: The title name is displayed during the conversation

common.Business edition features: This is the commercial version function ~
common.Name: Name

file.Empty file tip: The file content is empty. The file may be unreadable or pure image file content.
file.File content can not be empty: File content can not be empty
file.Select and drag file tip: Click or drag the file here to upload
file.Select file amount limit: A maximum of {{max}} files can be selected
file.Select file amount limit 100: You can select a maximum of 100 files at a time
file.Some file count exceeds limit: The number of files exceeding {{maxCount}} has been automatically intercepted
file.Some file size exceeds limit: Some files exceed: {{maxSize}}, have been filtered
file.Support max count: A maximum of {{maxCount}} files are supported.

folder.No Folder: There's no subdirectory. Just put it here
folder.empty: There is nothing to choose from in this directory

jsonEditor.Parse error: Json parse error, please check it

speech.not support: Your browser does not support voice input

app.Api request desc: Access to the existing system through API, or enterprise micro, flying book, etc
app.Make a brief introduction of your app: Make a brief introduction of your app
app.Question Guide Tip: At the end of the conversation, three leading questions will be asked.
app.Share link desc: Share links with other users and use them directly without logging in
app.Share link desc detail: You can share the model directly with other users to have a conversation, and the other user can have a conversation directly without logging in. Note that this function will consume the balance of your account, please keep the link!
app.Simple Config Tip: Only basic functions are included. For complex agent functions, use advanced orchestration.
app.TTS Tip: After this function is enabled, the voice playback function can be used after each conversation. Use of this feature may incur additional charges.
app.Tool call tip: The AI model automatically selects one or more tools to use. If this feature is enabled, the knowledge base call is also called as a tool. Please try to choose the AI model that supports "function call", the effect is better.

ToolCall.This plugin cannot be called as a tool: This tool cannot be used in easy mode

edit.Confirm Save App Tip: The application may be in advanced orchestration mode, and the advanced orchestration configuration will be overwritten after saving, please confirm!
edit.Out Ad Edit: You are about to exit the Advanced orchestration page, please confirm
edit.Query extension background tip:
Describing the scope of the current conversation makes it easier for AI to complete first or vague questions, thereby enhancing the knowledge base's ability to continue conversations.
If the value is empty, the question completion function is not used for [first question].

error.App name can not be empty: App name can not be empty

outLink.Iframe block title: Copy the Iframe below and add it to your web page
outLink.Link block title: Copy the link below to your browser to open
outLink.Script block title: Add the following code to your website

share.Amount limit tip: A maximum of 10 groups can be created
share.Create link tip: The creation is successful. The share address has been copied and can be shared directly

template.Classify and dataset desc: Classify the user's problems first, then perform different actions according to the different types of problems.
template.Common template tip:
Common template
Can completely self-configure AI properties and knowledge base
template.Dataset and guide desc: Conduct a knowledge base search each time a question is asked, inject the search results into the LLM model for reference answers
template.Guide and variables desc: You can send a prompt at the beginning of the conversation, or ask the user to fill in something as a variable for the conversation
template.Simple chat desc: An extremely simple AI conversation application
template.Simple template tip:
Simple template
Has built-in parameter details

tip.chatNodeSystemPromptTip: Indicates the fixed guide word of the model. If this content is adjusted, the model chat direction can be guided. The content is fixed at the beginning of the context. You can use variables such as {{language}}
tip.userGuideTip: You can set the guide language before the session, set global variables, set next guidelines
tip.variableTip:
You can ask the user to fill in something as a specific variable for this round of conversation before the conversation starts. This module is located after the opening boot.
variables can be injected into other modules with string input in the form of {{variable key}}, such as: prompts, qualifiers, etc.
tip.welcomeTextTip:
Before each conversation begins, send an initial content. Support standard Markdown syntax, additional tags can be used :
[shortcut button]: The user can send the question directly after clicking

tts.Test Listen Text: Hello, this is a voice test, if you can hear this sentence, it means that the voice playback function is normal

whisper.Auto send tip: After the voice input is completed, you can send it directly, without manually clicking the send button
whisper.Auto tts response tip: Questions sent through voice input will be answered directly in the form of voice. Please ensure that the voice broadcast function is enabled.
whisper.Not tts tip: You have not turned on Voice playback and the feature is not available

chat.Chat API is error or undefined: The session interface reported an error or returned null
chat.Confirm to clear share chat history: Are you sure to delete all chats?
chat.Custom History Title Description: If set to empty, chat history will be followed automatically.
chat.Mark Description:
The annotation feature is currently in beta. 

 After clicking Add annotation, you need to select a knowledge base in order to store annotation data. You can use this feature to quickly annotate questions and expected answers to guide the model to the next answer. At present, the annotation function, like other data in the knowledge base, is affected by the model, which does not mean that the annotation meets 100% expectations. The 

 annotation data is only unidirectional synchronization with the knowledge base. If the knowledge base modifies the annotation data, the annotation data displayed in the log cannot be synchronized
chat.Question Guide: I guess what you're asking is
chat.Select dataset Desc: Select a dataset to store the expected answers

error.Messages empty: Interface content is empty, maybe the text is too long ~

feedback.Close User Like:
The user like
Click to close the tag
feedback.No Content: The user did not fill in the specific feedback content
feedback.Read User dislike:
User dislike
Click to view content

quote.Quote Tip: Only the actual reference content is displayed here. If the data is updated, it will not be updated in real time

response.Read complete response tips: Click to see the detailed process

tip.leave page: Content has been modified, are you sure to leave the page?

dataset.Common Dataset Desc: Knowledge bases can be built by importing files, web links, or manual entry
dataset.Delete Confirm: Are you sure to delete the knowledge base? Data cannot be recovered after deletion, please confirm!
dataset.Empty Dataset Tips: There is no knowledge base yet, go create one!
dataset.Intro Placeholder: This dataset has not yet been introduced~
dataset.Name: Name
dataset.Query extension intro: If the problem completion function is enabled, the accuracy of knowledge base search can be improved in continuous conversations. After this function is enabled, when searching the knowledge base, AI will be used to complete the missing information of the problem according to the conversation records.
dataset.Website Dataset Desc: Web site synchronization allows you to build a knowledge base directly from a web link

collection.Start Sync Tip: Are you sure to start synchronizing data? The old data will be deleted and then re-acquired, please confirm!
collection.Website Create Success: Created successfully, data is being synchronized

result.sameRaw: The content has not changed and no update is required.

data.Auxiliary Data Placeholder: This section is optional, usually in conjunction with the previous [data content], to build a structured prompt word, for special scenarios, up to {{maxToken}} words.
data.Auxiliary Data Tip:
This section is divided into optional fields 
 This content is usually designed to work with the previous data content to build structured prompt words for special scenarios
data.Data Content Placeholder: The input field is required, and the content is usually a description of the knowledge point, or it can be a user question, at most {{maxToken}} words.
data.Data Content Tip:
The input box is a required field 
 The content is usually a description of the knowledge point, but also can be a user question.
data.Default Index Tip: Cannot be edited, the default index will use the text of [related data content] and [auxiliary data] to generate an index directly, if the default index is not needed, you can delete it. Each piece of data must have more than one index. After all indexes are deleted, a default index is automatically generated.
data.Empty Tip: This collection has no data yet

dataset.embedding model tip: The index model can transform the natural language into vectors for semantic retrieval. Note that different index models cannot be used together and cannot be modified after selecting the index model.

error.Data not found: The data does not exist or has been deleted
error.unAuthDataset: No access to this knowledge base
error.unAuthDatasetCollection: Not authorized to manipulate this data set
error.unAuthDatasetData: Not authorized to manipulate this data
error.unAuthDatasetFile: No permission to manipulate this file
error.unCreateCollection: No permission to manipulate this data

import.Auto mode Estimated Price Tips: Need to call the file processing model, need to consume more Tokens: {{price}} credits /1k Tokens
import.Auto process desc: Automatically set segmentation and preprocessing rules
import.CSV Import Tip: Import q and a from csv, data is required to be sorted out in advance
import.Chunk Split Tip: After the text is segmented according to certain rules, it is converted into a format that can conduct semantic search, which is suitable for most scenarios.
import.Csv format error: The csv file format is incorrect, please ensure that the index and content columns are two
import.Custom split char Tips: Allows you to block according to custom delimiters. It is usually used for processed data, using specific delimiters to precisely block it.
import.Custom text desc: Manually enter a piece of text as the collection
import.Embedding Estimated Price Tips: Use only the index model and consume a small amount of Tokens: {{price}} credits /1k Tokens
import.Fetch url placeholder: Up to 10 links, one per line.
import.Fetch url tip: Only static links can be read, please check the results
import.Ideal chunk length Tips:
Segment by end symbol. We recommend that your document should be properly punctuated to ensure that each complete sentence length does not exceed this value 
 Chinese document recommended 400~1000
 English document recommended 600~1200
import.Import Success Tip: The {{num}} group data is imported successfully. Please wait for training.
import.Import Tip: This task cannot be terminated and takes some time to generate indexes. Please confirm the import. If the balance is insufficient, the unfinished task will be suspended and can continue after topping up.
import.Import success: Import successful, please wait for training
import.Link name placeholder:
Only static links are supported
One per line, up to 10 links at a time
import.Local file desc: Upload files in PDF, TXT, DOCX and other formats
import.QA Estimated Price Tips: Need to call the file processing model, need to consume more Tokens: {{price}} credits /1k Tokens
import.QA Import Tip: According to certain rules, the text is broken into a larger paragraph, and the AI is invoked to generate a question and answer pair for the paragraph.
import.Web link desc: Fetch static web content as a collection

search.Empty result response Tips: If you fill in the content, if no suitable content is found, you will directly reply to the content.
search.Max Tokens Tips: The maximum number of Tokens in a single search, about 1 word in Chinese =1.7Tokens, about 1 word in English =1 tokens
search.Min Similarity Tips: The similarity of different index models is different, please use the search test to select the appropriate value
search.No support similarity: Relevance filtering is supported when using only rearrangement or semantic search
search.ReRank desc: The rearrangement model is used for secondary ranking to enhance the overall ranking.

mode.embedding desc: Use vectors for text correlation queries
mode.fullTextRecall desc: Using traditional full-text search, suitable for finding data with specific keywords and main predicates
mode.mixedRecall desc: Returns the combined results of vector and full-text searches, sorted using the RRF algorithm.

score.fullText desc: Calculate the score of the same keyword, ranging from 0 to infinity.
score.fullTextRecall desc: Using traditional full-text search, suitable for finding specific data with keywords and main predicates
score.mixedRecall desc: Returns the combined results of vector and full-text searches, sorted using the RRF algorithm.
score.reRank desc: The correlation degree between sentences was calculated by ReRank model, ranging from 0 to 1.
score.rrf desc: Multiple search results are combined by inverting calculation.

test.Test Text Placeholder: Enter the text you want to test
test.test result placeholder: The test results will be presented here
test.test result tip: The contents of the knowledge base are sorted according to their similarity to the test text, and you can adjust the corresponding text according to the test results. Note: The data in the test record may have been modified, clicking on a test data will show the latest data.

training.Auto mode Tip: Subindex and call model are used to generate relevant questions and abstracts to increase the semantic richness of data blocks and facilitate retrieval. It consumes more storage space and increases the number of AI calls.

website.Config Description: The Web site synchronization function allows you to fill in the root address of a website, and the system will automatically crawl the relevant pages deeply for knowledge base training. Only crawls static websites, mainly project documents and blogs.
website.Confirm Create Tips: Confirm to synchronize the site, the synchronization task will start later, please confirm!
website.Confirm Update Tips: Are you sure to update the site configuration? The synchronization starts immediately with the new configuration. Please confirm
website.UnValid Website Tip: Your site may not be static and cannot be synchronized

module.Default value placeholder: Null characters are returned by default
module.Plugin output must connect: Custom outputs must all be connected

QueryExtension.placeholder: Questions about python introduction and usage, etc. The current conversation is related to the game GTA5.
QueryExtension.tip:
Describes the scope of the current conversation, making it easier for the AI to complete first or vague questions, thereby enhancing the knowledge base's ability to continue conversations.If 
 is empty, the question completion function is not used in the first conversation.

module.Unlink tip: [{{name}}] An unfilled or unconnected parameter exists

extract.Enum Description: Lists the possible values for the field, one per row
extract.Required Description: Even if the field cannot be extracted, it is returned with the default value

http.Props tip:
You can set parameters related to Http requests
Global changes or external parameter inputs can be invoked by {{key}}
http.Url and params have been split: Path parameters are automatically added to Params
http.curl import placeholder: Please enter the curl format content, and the request information for the first interface will be extracted.

description.Http Request Header:
User-defined request header, please strictly fill in the JSON string.
1. Make sure the last attribute has no commas
2. Make sure key contains double quotes
For example: {"Authorization":"Bearer xxx"}
description.Http Request Url: New HTTP request address. If two 'request addresses' appear, the module can be deleted and rejoined, and the latest module configuration will be pulled.
description.Quote:
Object array format, structure:
[{q:' question ',a:' answer '}]
description.Response content:
You can use \n to achieve continuous line wrapping.
Replies can be achieved by external module input, which overwrites the content currently filled in.
If passed non-string type data will be automatically converted to a string
description.TFSwitch textarea: Allows you to define a number of strings to achieve false matching, one per line, and supports regular expressions.
description.Trigger: Most of the time, you don't need to concatenate this property. You can connect this property when you need to delay execution, or precisely control the timing of execution.
description.dynamic input: Receives parameters dynamically added by the user and will be tiled in at run time
description.textEditor textarea: The passed variable can be referenced by {{key}}. Variables support only strings or numbers.

placeholder.Classify background:
For example:
1.AIGC (Artificial Intelligence Generates content) refers to the automatic or semi-automatic generation of digital content, such as text, images, music, videos, and so on, using artificial intelligence technologies. AIGC technologies include, but are not limited to, natural language processing, computer vision, machine learning, and deep learning. These technologies can create new content or modify existing content to meet specific creative, educational, entertainment or information needs.

description.Ai response content: Will be triggered after the stream reply is complete
description.New context: Concatenate the reply content with history and return it as a new context
description.Quote: Always return an array, if you want the search results to be empty to perform additional operations, you need to use the above two inputs and the trigger of the target module
description.query extension result: Output as an array of strings to connect the result directly to the 'Question' of the knowledge base search
description.running done: Triggered when the module call finish

template.AI response switch tip: If you want the current node not to output content, you can turn this switch off. AI output content will not be shown to the user, you can manually use the "AI reply content" for special processing.
template.AI support tool tip: A model that supports function calls allows better use of tool calls.
template.Assigned reply intro: The module can respond directly to a specified piece of content. Often used to guide and prompt. When non-string content is passed in, it is converted to a string for output.
template.Chat entrance intro: When the user sends a content, the flow will start from this module.
template.Classify question intro:
Determine the type of question based on the user's history and current issue. Multiple sets of question types can be added, here is a template example: 
 type 1: Hello
type 2: Questions about 'use'
type 3: Questions about 'purchase'
type 4: Other questions
template.Dataset search intro: Invoke the Dataset search capability to find content that may be relevant to the problem
template.Dataset search result concat intro: Multiple knowledge base search results can be combined and output
template.Extract field intro: Can extract specified data from the text, such as: sql statements, search keywords, code, etc.
template.Http request intro: Can issue an HTTP request to implement more complex operations (Internet search, database query, etc.)
template.Query extension intro: If the problem completion function is enabled, the accuracy of knowledge base search can be improved in continuous conversations. After this function is enabled, when searching the knowledge base, AI will be used to complete the missing information of the problem according to the conversation records.
template.Running app intro: You can select a different app to run
template.TFSwitch intro: Output True False based on what is passed in. By default, false is printed when the content passed in is false, undefined, null, 0, none. You can also add some custom strings to supplement the output of false.
template.textEditor intro: Output of fixed or incoming text after edit

variable.variable option is value is required: Variable option is value is required

plugin.Delete http plugin: Are you sure to delete this group of HTTP plug-ins? All plug-ins in the directory are deleted.
plugin.Http plugin intro placeholder: Only for demonstration, no practical effect
plugin.Intro placeholder: If the plug-in is called as a tool, the introduction is used as the prompt word.

dataset.Confirm to delete the file: Are you sure to delete the file and all its data?
dataset.Manual collection Tip: Manual Collections allow you to create a custom container to hold data
dataset.Queue Desc: This data refers to the current amount of training for the entire system. FastGPT uses queued training, and if you have too much data to train, you may need to wait for a while
dataset.Select Dataset Tips: Select only knowledge bases with the same index model

collections.Confirm to delete the folder: Are you sure to delete this folder and all its contents?

data.input is empty: The data content cannot be empty

dataset.deleteFolderTips: Are you sure to delete this folder and all the knowledge bases it contains? Data cannot be recovered after deletion, please confirm!
dataset.import csv tip: Ensure that the CSV is in UTF-8 format; otherwise, garbled characters will be displayed

file.If the imported file is garbled, please: If the imported file is garbled, please convert CSV to UTF-8 encoding format
file.Release the mouse to upload the file: Release the mouse to upload the file
file.upload error description: Only upload multiple files or one folder at a time

home.Choice Debug Desc: Search testing, reference modification, full conversation preview and many other debugging ways
home.Choice Desc: FastGPT follows the Apache License 2.0 open source protocol
home.Choice Extension Desc: HTTP based extension, easy to achieve custom functions
home.Choice Fast Desc: {{title}} provides out-of-the-box visual actions to build AI applications point-by-point
home.Choice Models Desc: Supports multiple models such as GPT, Claude, Spark, and ChatGLM
home.Choice Open Desc: {{title}} follows the Apache License 2.0 open source protocol
home.Choice QA Desc: The index is constructed with the structure of QA pairs, and ADAPTS to various scenarios such as Q&A and reading
home.Choice Visual Desc: Visualize modular operations, easily implement complex workflows, and make your AI no longer monolithic
home.FastGPT Desc: {{title}} is a dataset question answering system based on LLM large language model, which provides out-of-the-box data processing, model invocation and other capabilities. At the same time, workflow orchestration can be performed through Flow visualization to achieve complex Q&A scenarios!
home.Quickly build AI question and answer lib: Quickly build AI question and answer library
home.desc: AI knowledge base question and answer platform based on LLM large model
home.slogan: Let the AI know more about you

module.Confirm Delete Module: Confirm to delete the custom module?
module.Confirm Sync Plugin: Confirm the latest sync plugin information? The plug-in connection and input content will be cleared, please confirm!
module.Plugin input is not value: User-defined input parameters cannot be null
module.Plugin input is required: The plug setting must contain an input module
module.Plugin input must connect: Custom input modules must all be connected

openapi.app key tips: These keys have the identification of the current application and can be used by external access.
openapi.key alias: Alias of key, for display only
openapi.key tips: You can use the API Key to access certain interfaces (you can't access the application, you need to use the API key within the application to access the application).

outlink.QPM Tips: The maximum number of queries per IP address per minute
outlink.token auth Tips: Identity verification server address. If this value is set, the server will be specified to send a request for identity verification before each session

openapi.Copy success: The API address has been copied
openapi.New api key tip: Please keep your secret key, the secret key will not be displayed again~

outlink.Delete link tip: Are you sure to delete this no-sign link? After deletion, the link will be invalid immediately and the session log will still be retained. Please confirm!
outlink.Max usage points tip: The maximum number of credits allowed for this link will not be used. -1 indicates no limit.

share.Response Quote tips: The referenced content is returned in the share link, but the user is not allowed to download the original document.

limit.No permission rerank: Not permission to rerank, please upgrade your plan

user.Go laf env: Click to go to laf to get PAT certificate.
user.Laf account course: Check out the laf account binding tutorial.
user.Laf account intro: After binding your laf account, you will be able to use the laf module in your workflow to write code online.

login.Policy tip: By using it, you agree with us
login.Root login: Log in as the root user
login.Root password placeholder: root password is the environment variable you set

wallet.Balance not enough tip: The balance is insufficient, please go to the account page first
wallet.Not sufficient: Your AI points are insufficient, please upgrade the package or purchase additional AI points before continuing to use.

subscription.AI points click to read tip: Each time an AI model is invoked, a certain amount of AI credits (similar to Tokens) are consumed. Click to view the detailed calculation rules.
subscription.AI points usage tip: Each time the AI model is invoked, a certain amount of AI credits are consumed. Please refer to the "Charging Standard" above for specific calculation standards.
subscription.Change will take effect after the curren: Change will take effect after the current subscription expires
subscription.Dataset store price tip: Deduct it from the account balance on the 1st of each month
subscription.Extra plan tip: When the standard plan is not enough, you can purchase an additional plan to continue using
subscription.Refund plan and pay confirm: There is no extra cost for you to switch this package and {{amount}} will be refunded to the balance.
subscription.Standard plan pay confirm: To switch this package, you need to pay {{payPrice}} Yuan.
subscription.Sub plan tip: Use FastGPT for free or upgrade to a higher plan

template.Quote Content Tip:
This configuration takes effect only when reference content is passed in (knowledge base search).
You can customize the structure of the reference content to better suit different scenarios. Some variables can be used for template configuration:
{{q}} - retrieve content, {{a}} - expected content, {{source}} - source, {{sourceId}} - source file name, {{index}} - the first n references, they are optional, Here are the default values:
{{default}}

user.Invite url tip: Friends who register through this link will be permanently bound to you, and you will get a certain balance reward when they recharge. In addition, when friends register with their mobile phone number, you will get 5 yuan reward immediately.
user.Promotion rate tip: You will be rewarded with a percentage of the balance when your friends top up

team.Invite Member Tips: They can access or use other resources within your team
team.Invite Role Admin Tip:
Admin
Can create, edit, and use team resources
team.Invite Role Visitor Tip:
Visitors
Can only use resources and have no permission to create and edit them
team.Processing invitations Tips: You have {{amount}} of team invitations that need to be processed
team.Remove Member Confirm Tip: Are you sure you want to move {{username}} off the team? All its resources are transferred to the team creator's account.
team.Team Tags Async Tip: Fill in the tag sync connection to get the latest

invite.Deal Width Footer Tip: It will automatically shut down after processing~
